response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item carries a unique value that goes beyond its price tag, making it an invaluable addition to any collection. Considering its extraordinary features and benefits, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This generous offer reflects my confidence in the product's ability to exceed your expectations. I believe this investment will not only provide you with unparalleled utility but also appreciate in value over time. I look forward to your consideration and the opportunity to serve you with our premium product.", "product_price": 12000}
